description_html: Award-winning designer Mac Stopa is known for his bold and innovative designs. His latest release, River Snake for the Tonon collection, is no exception. River Snake’s modular stool can be used singularly or grouped together to form countless configurations of shapes and patterns, supported by an optional aluminum ganging system. The organic design, matched with a lightweight yet sturdy construction, allows River Snake to adapt to a wide range of uses in public spaces. Manufactured from “Soft Touch Plus” polyurethane material and reinforced with a steel internal sub-frame, this construction offers a cushioned yet supportive base, which is additionally weatherproof and flame retardant. River Snake offers a unique adaptability which allows it to be compact enough to be stored discretely as a singular stool, while the product can effortlessly be transformed into original and innovative configurations on a larger scale. As a result, River Snake can complement a diverse range of indoor and outdoor environments. Available in 8 standard colors plus metallic silver, River Snake is also offered in custom colors, subject to minimum quantities. Made in Italy.
product_name: River Snake by Mac Stopa for Tonon / River collection
